languages.text: "Да полноте, Лорд-капитан... в этом теле еще есть силы! Ваш сенешаль так просто не сдастся каким-то..." {n}Абеляр охает и хватается за бок.{/n} "Только бы присесть минут на пять..."

"Pray, Lord Captain! There is enough strength in this body yet! Your Seneschal will not be so easily broken by some..." {n}He groans and clutches his side.{/n} "I could just use... a brief respite..."
languages.original_text: "Да полноте, Лорд-капитан... в этом теле еще есть силы! Ваш сенешаль так просто не сдастся каким-то..." {n}Абеляр охает и хватается за бок.{/n} "Только бы присесть минут на пять..."

traits.locale_text: "Please, Lord Captain! There is enough strength in this body yet! Your Seneschal will not be so easily broken by some..." {n}He groans and clutches his side.{/n} "I could just use... a brief respite..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「祈りましょう、ロード・キャプテン！この体にはまだ力が残されています！あなたの家令長です。そう簡単にやられたりなど…」{n}彼はうめき声を上げ、脇腹を押さえている。{/n}「ほんの少しでいいので…休ませてください…」
languages.original_text: "Pray, Lord Captain! There is enough strength in this body yet! Your Seneschal will not be so easily broken by some..." {n}He groans and clutches his side.{/n} "I could just use... a brief respite..."

traits.locale_text: 「祈りましょう、ロード・キャプテン！この体にはまだ力が残されています！あなたの家令長です。そう簡単にやられたりなど…」{n}彼はうめき声を上げ、脇腹を押さえている。{/n}「ほんの少しでいいので…休ませてください…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “希望如此，舰长大人！不过，这把老骨头还有点力量！您的总领可不会这么容易，就被某个……”{n}他呻吟着，弯下了腰。{/n}“请允许我……稍微……休息一下……”
languages.original_text: "Pray, Lord Captain! There is enough strength in this body yet! Your Seneschal will not be so easily broken by some..." {n}He groans and clutches his side.{/n} "I could just use... a brief respite..."

traits.locale_text: “希望如此，舰长大人！不过，这把老骨头还有点力量！您的总领可不会这么容易，就被某个……”{n}他呻吟着，弯下了腰。{/n}“请允许我……稍微……休息一下……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «¡Por favor, Lord Capitán! ¡Todavía hay suficiente fuerza en este cuerpo! Su Senescal no será tan fácilmente quebrantado...». {n}Gime y se agarra el costado.{/n} «Me vendría bien... un breve respiro... eso sí».
languages.original_text: "Pray, Lord Captain! There is enough strength in this body yet! Your Seneschal will not be so easily broken by some..." {n}He groans and clutches his side.{/n} "I could just use... a brief respite..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Por favor, Lord Capitán! ¡Todavía hay suficiente fuerza en este cuerpo! Su Senescal no será tan fácilmente quebrantado...». {n}Gime y se agarra el costado.{/n} «Me vendría bien... un breve respiro... eso sí».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Also bitte, Lord Captain! In diesem Körper ist noch genug Kraft! Euer Truchsess lässt sich nicht so leicht brechen, schon gar nicht von ..." {n}Er stöhnt und greift hält sich die Seite.{/n} "Ich könnte nur eine ... kurze Rast ... brauchen ..."
languages.original_text: "Pray, Lord Captain! There is enough strength in this body yet! Your Seneschal will not be so easily broken by some..." {n}He groans and clutches his side.{/n} "I could just use... a brief respite..."

traits.locale_text: "Also bitte, Lord Captain! In diesem Körper ist noch genug Kraft! Euer Truchsess lässt sich nicht so leicht brechen, schon gar nicht von ..." {n}Er stöhnt und greift hält sich die Seite.{/n} "Ich könnte nur eine ... kurze Rast ... brauchen ..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Ne vous inquiétez pas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Ce corps est encore bien assez vigoureux ! Votre sénéchal ne se laissera pas abattre par un... {n}Il grogne et porte les mains à ses côtes.{/n} Mais je ne serais pas contre... une petite pause... »
languages.original_text: "Pray, Lord Captain! There is enough strength in this body yet! Your Seneschal will not be so easily broken by some..." {n}He groans and clutches his side.{/n} "I could just use... a brief respite..."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous inquiétez pas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Ce corps est encore bien assez vigoureux ! Votre sénéchal ne se laissera pas abattre par un... {n}Il grogne et porte les mains à ses côtes.{/n} Mais je ne serais pas contre... une petite pause... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Aman Lord Kaptan! Vücudumdaki kuvvet henüz tükenmedi ya! Seneşalinizi öyle kolay kolay..." {n}Sızlayarak böğrünü sıkıca tutuyor.{/n} "Sadece birazcık... Dinlensem iyiydi..."
languages.original_text: "Pray, Lord Captain! There is enough strength in this body yet! Your Seneschal will not be so easily broken by some..." {n}He groans and clutches his side.{/n} "I could just use... a brief respite..."

traits.locale_text: "Aman Lord Kaptan! Vücudumdaki kuvvet henüz tükenmedi ya! Seneşal'inizi öyle kolay kolay..." {n}Sızlayarak böğrünü sıkıca tutuyor.{/n} "Sadece birazcık... Dinlensem iyiydi..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
